Variable.name: port
Variable.doc: The port that the server will listen on (default: 7638).
stripped_doc: The port that the server will listen on (default: 7638).
Variable.desc: The port that the server will listen on (default: 7638).

Variable.name: interface
Variable.doc:
The interface that the server will listen on.

As well as real interface names (e.g. en0) the following values are valid:
* An IP address of one of your interfaces
    * localhost
    * loopback
    * nil (which means all interfaces, and is the default)
stripped_doc: The interface that the server will listen on.
As well as real interface names (e.g. en0) the following values are valid:
* An IP address of one of your interfaces
* localhost
* loopback
* nil (which means all interfaces, and is the default)
Variable.desc: The interface that the server will listen on.

Variable.name: password
Variable.doc:
The password to access the webinterface.

default: changeme
stripped_doc: The password to access the webinterface.
default: changeme
Variable.desc: The password to access the webinterface.
